post_title: T206 HOFer Sam Crawford with bat - Tolstoi back ***SOLD***
post_content:
***SOLD***

Offering for sale this T206 Tolstoi back Sam Crawford with bat in a PSA 2.5.  Beautiful card, but I'm going another direction.  $725 or make me an offer.
